00002 #include "FusionCHPData.h"
00003 #include "FusionCHPLegacyData.h"
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 using namespace affymetrix_fusion_io;
00008 
00009 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00010 {
00011         const char* fileName = argv[1];
00012         try
00013         {
00014                 FusionCHPData *chp = FusionCHPDataReg::Read(fileName);
00015                 if (chp == NULL)
00016                 {
00017                         cout << "Error reading the file." << endl;
00018                         return 0;
00019                 }
00020                 FusionCHPLegacyData *legchp = FusionCHPLegacyData::FromBase(chp);
00021                 if (legchp == NULL)
00022                 {
00023                         cout << "The example is for expression CHP files only" << endl;
00024                         return 0;
00025                 }
00026                 if (legchp->GetHeader().GetAssayType() != FusionExpression)
00027                 {
00028                         cout << "The example is for expression only." << endl;
00029                         return 0;
00030                 }
00031 
00032                 FusionExpressionProbeSetResults psResults;
00033                 float sum = 0;
00034                 int n = legchp->GetHeader().GetNumProbeSets();
00035                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00036                 {
00037                         legchp->GetExpressionResults(i, psResults);
00038                         sum += psResults.GetSignal();
00039                 }
00040                 float avg = sum / n;
00041                 cout << "The average signal is: " << avg << endl;
00042 
00043                 // Delete the chp object.
00044                 delete legchp;
00045         }
00046         catch (...)
00047         {
00048                 cout << "Error reading the file." << endl;
00049         }
00050         return 0;
00051 }
